meanings.definition: Be a sign or indication of.
meanings.sent1: The dark clouds denotes an approaching storm.
meanings.sent2: A red traffic light denotes that you should stop.
meanings.sent3: His loud snoring denotes that he is fast asleep.
meanings.sent4: The ringing bell denotes the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of birds denotes the arrival of spring.

meanings.definition: Stand as a name or symbol for.
meanings.sent1: In this story, the sword denotes bravery and courage.
meanings.sent2: The national flag denotes the identity of a country.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a crown denotes royalty in fairy tales.
meanings.sent4: The dove denotes peace in many cultures.
meanings.sent5: A heart symbol denotes love and affection.
